OffenceActAndSection.OffenceActAndSectionText: Contrary to regulations 16(6) and 20 of the Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathles (Wales) Regulations 2018.
OffenceActAndSection.SecondLanguageOffenceActAndSectionText: Yn groes i reoliadau 16(6) a 20 o Reoliadau Clefydau Sbyngaidd Trosglwyddadwy (Cymalafiechydon) (Cymru) 2018.
